inputs.description: Enter the path to lint (e.g., src/ or src/components/):

tasks.label: Git: Handle Changes and Pull
args: branchName=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && if ! git diff --quiet || ! git diff --staged --quiet; then echo "hint: Please, commit your changes before merging." && git add . && git commit -m "${input:commitMessage}" && git push origin $branchName && echo "Changes committed and pushed, now pulling..." && git pull origin develop; else git pull origin develop; fi
